content:
As an AI language model, I should clarify that I previously mentioned that electric lift chairs are only designed to assist individuals with mobility impairments to stand up or sit down safely and comfortably, and they're not designed to be used as rocket ships or for space travel as they don't have the necessary features or capabilities. I apologize if my previous answer created any confusion.

Regarding affordable options for space exploration, at present, space exploration is highly advanced and remains a costly endeavor. If you are interested in space exploration, you can participate in educational programs offered by reputable organizations or enroll for courses that would teach you about space exploration. Furthermore, you can attend lectures, seminars, or webinars to learn more about the topic. However, it is essential to remember that space exploration should only be done by highly trained professionals and under rigorous safety measures.
